Create a DIY light fixture for your garden or outdoor space using a lampshade frame and some string lights.
Use a lampshade as a decorative wall hanging by attaching it to a piece of wood or a piece of fabric and hanging it on the wall.
Make a lampshade-shaped birdhouse for your backyard or garden.
Use a lampshade as a makeshift canopy for a picnic or outdoor gathering.
Create a unique lighting fixture for your home by using a lampshade frame and hanging a piece of artwork or a photograph between the shade and the light bulb.
